# maas_zone (Resource)

Provides a resource to manage MAAS zones.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the new zone.

### Optional

- `description` (String) A brief description of the new zone.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
